title: Suit & Tie Lite Watch Face
summary: Lite version of the classic Suit&Tie watch face
developerAddress: Bucharest, Sector 1, Str. Hatmanul Arbore nr 12
description: In an age where we can display the time on your wrist via a myriad of designs, the Suit & Tie watch face provides an analog experience for those who enjoy combining the timeless elegance of a classic watch with the latest digital technology.However if you want the full experience, get the Premium version.P.S.: For a true classic experience, pair it with a silver metallic wristband.
descriptionHTML:
In an age where we can display the time on your wrist via a myriad of designs, the Suit & Tie watch face provides an analog experience for those who enjoy combining the timeless elegance of a classic watch with the latest digital technology.

However if you want the full experience, get the Premium version.

P.S.: For a true classic experience, pair it with a silver metallic wristband.
comments: It's alright The idea and color scheme are nice and I was pleased that the design compensates for the black bar at the bottom of the Moto 360. But once installed it looks kind of cartoon-ish and needs some finer detail. Installed it doesn't look as refined as in the sample pictures.

Won't let me change anything after upgrading to pro.  Uninstaller and refunded. .  I like the face but it won't give me access. . Tell me what I am doing wrong and I'll try again and re-create but it should be easier than that.....
Can't upgrade I like that face but I've been trying to upgrade to Pro for days and it never works.  It says" error in the process " I never have this problem with other faces
Would not upgade. I PAID FOR PRO BUT IT WON'T WORK.
Smart classic Looks really nice on the LG urbane A bit different from the others. It's a good one for outdoor in sunny weather

Could not upgrade to pro. Every time i try to upgrade to pro it says your order could not be processed. I have tried waiting a week and tried different credit cards all of which work fine with other watch faces. Please fix and I'll upgrade.
